p: Aegle marmelos was identified by local experts and dry leaves were collected in Kandy, Sri Lanka on 30/05/2017 by Dr Tien Huynh. Dried P. niruri leaf samples were obtained from a commercial herbal products supplier in Malaysia (identified and collected by the supplier in Jalan Jelebu, Malaysia on 20/02/2017). Herbarium samples can be found at the Janaki Ammal Herbarium, Indian Institute of Integrative Medicine (Accession No. 18696) for A. marmelos and the University of South Florida Herbarium, Institute for Systematic Botany (Accession No. 66964) for P. niruri.
